00021 #ifndef SYLPH_DEBUG_H_
00022 #define SYLPH_DEBUG_H_
00023 #ifdef SYLPH_DEBUG
00024 #include "Exception.h"
00025 #include "String.h"
00026 #include "CurrentFunction.h"
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 
00029 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00033 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(Assertion);
00034 #define S_CREATE_ASSERTION(Class) S_CREATE_EXCEPTION2(Class,Assertion)
00035 
00039 S_CREATE_ASSERTION(StubTest);
00040 
00041 #define SYLPH_STUB std::cerr << "Warning: stub function: " << \
00042     S_CURRENT_FUNCTION << " in " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << "\n"
00043 
00044 #define SYLPH_STUB_TEST sthrow(StubTest,"Stub test")
00045 
00046 template<class A>
00047 inline void Assert(bool b) {
00048     if(!b) throw A("");
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<class A>
00052 inline void Assert(bool b, String s) {
00053     if(!b) throw A(s);
00054 }
00055 
00056 #define S_ASSERT(Pred) Assert<Assertion>(Pred,#Pred)
00057 
00058 #define S_DEBUG(Str) std::cerr << "Debug: " << Str << "\n";
00059 
00060 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00061 #else  /* SYLPH_DEBUG */
00062 #include "Exception.h"
00063 
00064 SYLPH_START_NAMESPACE
00068 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(Assertion);
00069 #define S_CREATE_ASSERTION(Class) S_CREATE_EXCEPTION2(Class,Assertion)
00070 
00071 #define S_ASSERT(Pred) Assert<Assertion>(Pred,#Pred)
00072 
00073 #define S_DEBUG(Str)
00074 
00075 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00076 
00077 #endif /* SYLPH_DEBUG */
00078 #endif  /* SYLPH_DEBUG_H_ */
00079
